Monologue.Current: // Из Баламба в Тимбер{Line}{Char Zell}{Line}“Эй, зацени!{Line} Это приватное купе для сидов!..”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Yo, check it out!{Line} So this is SeeD’s private cabin...!”
Selphie{Line}“I’m gonna hang out here for a bit.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Selphie}{Line}“Ой... ты иди, а я ещё здесь постою.”

Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“To the Future♬ We Will Go♬”

Monologue.Current: {Char Selphie}{Line}“И никому неведомо, каким будет оно.”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“Where It Leads♬ No One Knows♬”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“Selphie... We’re destined to be together!”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“Selphie... We’re destined to be together!”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“My heart’s pounding...{Line} What is this I’m feeling?”
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“My heart’s pounding...{Line} What is this I’m feeling?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“It’s an important mission.{Line} Get used to handling pressure{Line} while you still can.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“It’s an important mission.{Line} Get used to handling pressure{Line} while you still can.”

Monologue.Current: Selphie{Line}“How much longer ’til Galbadia?”{Line}(We should be there soon){Line}(A little while longer)
Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“How much longer ’til Galbadia?”{Line}(We should be there soon){Line}(A little while longer)
